name: 結華
text: （雨か……折りたたみ、持ってきてたっけ……？）
trans: (It's started to rain... Did I remember to bring my umbrella today...?)

name: 結華
text: ……あったあった、ツイてる～
trans: ...Oh, here it is. I'm in luck!

name: 霧子
text: あっ……結華ちゃん……？
trans: Oh... Is that Yuika?

name: 結華
text: ん？　きりりん！　どしたの？　お出かけ？
trans: Hm? Oh, hey Kiririn! What's up? You out and about?

name: 霧子
text:
う、ううん、事務所に行こうと思って……
……これ、みんなにも……
trans:
N-Not quite. I was headed to the office...
I wanted to share these with everyone.

name: 結華
text: リンゴ？　あ、そっか、実家青森だもんね
trans: Apples? Oh, that's right. Your family is from Aomori.

name: 霧子
text:
たくさんあるから……
結華ちゃんも、どうかな……
trans:
There's a lot, so...
You can have some if you'd like, Yuika...

name: 結華
text:
やったぁめっちゃ楽しみ！
三峰もこれから事務所戻るんだ、一緒に行こっか
trans: I sure would! I can't wait. Mitsumine was headed back to the office too, so let's go over together!

name: 霧子
text: う、うん……！
trans: Y-Yes!

name: 霧子
text: ……あの、結華ちゃん。この間は……ありがとう……
trans: Um, Yuika. Thank you... For earlier...

name: 結華
text: ？　なんのこと？
trans: Uh? For what, though?

name: 霧子
text:
一緒に……本を探してくれて……
患者さんも喜んでて……漫画をあげた子も、面白いって
trans: When you helped me... Find those books... The patients were all really happy with them... And the child I gave the manga to, said it was funny.

name: 結華
text:
あっ、ほんと？　良かった～、安心した！
好評なら何よりだよ
trans:
Oh, really? I'm so glad! Now I can rest easy.
That's all I was hoping to hear.

name: 霧子
text:
そ、それで……
お礼に……この本、よかったら……
trans: A-Anyway... In return... I wanted to give you this book.

name: 霧子
text:
あの……
わたしも何か、って……思って……！
trans: Um... I just wanted to do something nice... for you, too.

name: 結華
text: きりりんが……？
trans: You did?

name: 霧子
text:
……え、えっと……もし、つまらなかったら
別の本も持ってくるから……
trans: U-Um... And if, this book ends up being boring, I'll bring you a different one.

name: 結華
text:
とんでもない！　そんな心配しなくて大丈夫だよきりりん
ありがとう、すごく嬉しい
trans: There's no way! You don't need to worry about that, Kiririn. Thank you so much! I can't wait to read it.

name: 結華
text:
……早く事務所に戻らなきゃだね
この本、濡れちゃったら嫌だし
trans: ...We need to hurry and get on back. It'd suck if the book you gave me got all wet.

name: 霧子
trans: Yes!

name: 霧子
text: ありがとう……！
trans: Thank you...!

name: 結華
text: お疲れ様でーす
trans: Good afternoon.

name: 霧子
text: お疲れ様、です……
trans: Good, afternoon...

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ、お疲れ様、ふたりとも
一緒だったんだね
trans:
Ah! Good afternoon, you two.
You were together, I see.

name: 結華
text:
おお、さくやん！　お疲れ様、来てたんだね
きりりんとはさっきそこで会ったとこ。ね？
trans:
Hey, Sakuyan! We've finally arrived.
I ran into Kiririn by the station earlier. Right?

name: 霧子
text: うん……
trans: Yes...

name: 結華
text: 今日はレッスン早かったんじゃないの？
trans: Did you all finish up today's lessons early?

name: 咲耶
text:
そうなんだけど、霧子も来るって連絡があったからね
結華が終わるまで待っていようかって話になったんだ
trans: Well, yes. Since we heard that Kiriko would also be stopping by the office. We were going to all wait here until you got back.

name: 咲耶
text: ただ……
trans: Except...

name: 恋鐘
text: くー……くー……
trans: Zzz... Zzz...

name: 摩美々
text: すー……すー……
trans: Snrk... Snrk...

name: 咲耶
text: ふたりは途中で寝てしまったんだけれどね
trans: They both fell asleep in the meantime.

name: 結華
text: 見事なまでにぐっすりだねぇ
trans: Whew, they're completely conked out.

name: 咲耶
text: 起こすのも悪いし、そのままに……と思って
trans: It felt rude to wake them up, so I thought I'd just let them rest...

name: 結華
text:
いいんじゃない？
今度はふたりが起きるまで三峰が待ってるよ
trans: Well, what's wrong that? Mitsumine would be happy to wait until they both wake up.

name: 結華
text: この後特に予定もないしねー
trans: It's not like there's anything else planned beyond our unit meeting.

name: 咲耶
text: ……そうか。それならみんなでもう少し待とうじゃないか
trans: ...That's true. Why don't we wait a little while longer.

name: 霧子
text: わたし……リンゴ剥くね。いいかな……
trans: I'll... Peel some of these apples, then. If that's alright...

name: 結華
text: お願いしまーす
trans: Oh, please do!

name: 結華
text:
……おーっ。きりりん、皮剥きうまいね！
最後までひとつながりでいけそうじゃん
trans: ...Woah! You're so good at peeling them Kiririn! I bet you can get the whole peel off in one piece!

name: 霧子
text: 病院で……よく剥いてたから
trans: I peel apples a lot... when I'm at the hospital.

name: 結華
text:
へぇ、すごいすごい！
あれは？　うさちゃんとかできる？
trans:
Huuuh, that's so awesome!
Hey, can you do the thing where you cut them into little bunnies?

name: 霧子
text: うん……待ってて……！
trans: Yes... Wait just a moment!

name: 結華
text: わーい！
trans: Yaaay!

name: 摩美々
text: んー……？　みつみねのこえ……？
trans: Mmm... I hear Mitsumine's voice?

name: 結華
text: あ、まみみん起きたー？
trans: Oh? You awake now, Mamimin?

name: 摩美々
text: ……全員集合、してるー？
trans: Are we having our unit meeting?

name: 結華
text:
そうそう。待っててくれてありがとね
……ほら、きりりんが剥いてくれたりんごをお食べ
trans: Yeah, we're all here now. Thanks for waiting... Here, have some of the apples Kiririn's peeled for us.

name: 摩美々
text: んー……食べるー……
trans: Mmm... I will...

name: 霧子
text: ふふ……
trans: Eheh...

name: 摩美々
text: ……美味しー
trans: Mmm... so yummy.

name: 霧子
text: ……剥き、剥き……♪
trans: Peely, peely...♪

name: 咲耶
trans: Mmm...

name: 恋鐘
text: くー……くー……
trans: Zzz... Zzz...

name: 結華
text: （……静かだなぁ）
trans: (...It sure is quiet.)

name: 結華
text:
（……でも、嫌な感じじゃない
話してなくても、居心地悪くないし）
trans: (...But I don't mind. Even though we aren't talking, it doesn't feel uncomfortable.)

name: 結華
text: （……こういうの、いいなぁ）
trans: (...It's really nice, actually.)

name: 結華
text: ……ふふ
trans: ...Heheh.

name: 霧子
text: 結華ちゃん……？
trans: Yuika?

name: 結華
text: ……あのさ。今度、みんなで出かけない？
trans: ...Hey, um. Next time, I'd like to take all of you somewhere.

name: 摩美々
text:
急だねー……？
……まぁ、遊びに行くくらいならいいケド
trans:
That's random?
...But if you want us all to hang out, it's cool with me.

name: 霧子
text: ……わたしも、行きたいな
trans: ...I'd love to go somewhere with everyone, too.

name: 咲耶
text:
それは素敵な提案だね！ 
恋鐘だってきっと賛成してくれるはずさ
trans:
What a lovely suggestion!
If Kogane was awake, I'm sure she would agree.

name: 咲耶
text: 結華はどこへ行くつもりなのかな？
trans: Where do you plan to take us, Yuika?

name: 結華
text:
あー……それはまだ思いついてないんだけどさ
まぁ、当日のお楽しみってことで！
trans:
Ah... I actually haven't decided yet.
Well, look forward to finding out the day of!
